program_title: Participate in a Leading Study on Baby Development at York University
program_subtitle: Join a Globally Recognized Research Team and Take Home Great Gifts!
program_description:
Spend 30 minutes in a safe, welcoming environment observing your baby's curiosity and unique responses to engaging activities, led by a team of world-renowned experts in infant cognitive development. Your participation supports cutting-edge research at York University's acclaimed Visual and Cognitive Development Project, recognized worldwide for advancing our understanding of how babies see and learn.

What You Get:

A free Dove Tip-to-Toe Baby Wash (worth $8.00)

PLUS, choose one:

  • ‘Baby’s Firsts’ Memory Book to capture your child’s milestones with bonus Baby How-Tos collection of new parent infographics (worth $39.95), or
  • A starter pack with a 100% brushed cotton baby romper (size 3–6 mo) and a high-quality sail-cloth canvas bag (worth $49.99).
short_description: By pressing “Join Study” you are agreeing to the Terms and Conditions.

program_subtitle: Chosen Member of Like you Back on Facebook
story_paragraph1:
Like You Back by Family.one #3 selecting 5 of our members here to WIN 1-of-5 prizes of their choice!! OH... YES!!!


To be participate in future Like You Back by family.one simply like and follow our social media accounts. https://www.facebook.com/family.oneCanada/

This Time selected members are:


1. Shelly Wambolt

2. Shannon Jordan

3. Mikaila Nolan

4. Jenna McDonald

5. Ashleen Carag Bunuan


Selected members will get to choose 1 of the following prizes for their liking.
story_paragraph2:
If you were selected:

All you need to do is send us a message letting us know which of the following prizes you'd like to receive 


If you weren't selected:

All 5 selected members have liked our page before this post was created*. Active members have a better chance to get noticed 


1. LEGO DUPLO Jurassic World Gentle Giants

2. Fisher-Price Soothe & Glow Seahorse

3. Gund Sesame Street Take Along Elmo

4. Play Circle shopping cart

5. First 100 Board Book Box Set (3 books)

program_subtitle: Thank you Jennifer M. of Amherstburg, ON. for sharing a wonderful picture with us!
story_paragraph1:
Our team here at family.one hope you will enjoy all of the products with your family. 

Here's the review sent to us by Jennifer on our facebook page:


They are awesome! They giveaway stuff that is helpful and don't ask for anything in return. They have been a great help in assisting me to prepare to be a first-time mom.

Thank you so much!

Congratulations to Brenda P. of Whitehorse, YT., and her sweet baby boy Rafael for winning our giveaway.

Brenda had entered to win our giveaway to receive a full year of storage with Progenics and a chance to win a Mamaroo 4!
story_paragraph2: The 4moms mamaRoo 4 infant seat bounces up and down and sways from side to side, just like parents do when comforting their baby.
